content:
Name Crit Effect Type
I see Stars Normal damage. The target is dazzled until healed. Bludgeoning
Pinhole The target takes 1 persistent bleed damage that can't be removed until the target is healed. Piercing
Disembowel Triple damage. Slashing
Conduit The target takes a -2 status penalty to AC and saves against your bombs or spells until the end of yoru next turn. Bomb or Spell
name: Critical Hit Deck #10
